text: Kugucuka kwesimo kungeta kuhlukahlukana kwelufuto, futsi lokukhetsa kuyakususa kulelicembu lekuhlukahlukana lokuvetiwe.

Ngisho noma Al anenchazelo lecinile ngenganekwane yesayensi, Al wakha ligatja lelibalulekile lesayensi yabongcondvomshini, akhuluma ngendlela tintfo letitiphatsa ngayo, nangekuhlakanipha lokusemishinini.

Ngisho noma tindlela tekuhamba tincola ngalokuvamile takhiwa ngemapulango, tivumela emahhashi ladvonsa letincola kutsi akhone kuhamba ngelitubane lelikhulu abe advonsa imitfwalo lesindzako ngalokungafani nalapho ahamba emigwacweni lemibi legcwele ematje.

Tintfo tekuhamba tiwushitntjile umhlaba ngetindlela letisimanga. Intfo lenkhulu tintfo tekuhamba letiyentile kutsi tisente sihambe kalula futsi nangekushesha.
Loku kwentiwa kuze kucinisekiswe kutsi lesitfombe simbonye sonkhe sikrini. Loko kubitwa ngekutsi kugcwalisa sitfombe esikrinini.

Ngisho noma simo semtimba singase sishintje, kodvwa simo semakhemikhali sihlala sinjalo.

Isakhiwa namanje, kodvwa lokubaluleke kakhulu kutsi seyitsatselwe sikhundla ngemakhamera esimanjenje manje.

Imininingwane lemayelana nekufundza imiva nengcondvo yebantfu netilwane iniketa bufakazi lobuphatsekako kwendlela yekucabanga kuhlolisisa likhono lekucondza. Ngako-ke kunciphisa lapho kudzinga kucwaningwe khona futsi kwenta lolucwaningo lube ngulolucondzile.

Tindiza letifaka ekhatsi taka-Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways kanye neTurkish Airlines setihamba nakakhulu e-Afrika, futsi tiya emadolobheni lamanyenti lamakhulu e-Afrika ngemanani langasiwo lamakhulu nakucatsaniswa naletinye tindiza eYurophu.

Ngalokuvamile, kuhlala kulelinye live sikhatsi lesidze kutawudzinga kutsi utfole ivisa usengakayi kulelo live.

Tincenye tamanje teBelgium betiyincenye yeLuxembourg esikhatsini lesendlulile kodvwa tabese tiba yiBelgian ngemuva kwa-1830 ngemuva Kwetingucuko taseBelgian.

Kusukela nga-1988, emabhokisi ekufaka timvilophi tekuvota bekubonakala lokungekhatsi kuwo kuze kutsi kungabi nemvilophi lefakwa kusengakacali kuvota nekutsi kute timvilophi letengetwako ngaphandle kwaleto letifakwe bantfu labavote ngalokusemtsetfweni.

Lonakekela Ndvunankhulu Julia Gillard ngesikhatsi kuchubeka umkhankhaso welukhetfo wanga-2010 watsi ukholelwa kutsi i-Australia itoba live lelibuswa ngalokukhululekile nakuphela kubusa kweNdlovukazi Elizabeth II.
Hulumende we-Ireland ugcizelela kuphutfuma kwekubeka umtsetfo kwahulunde kulungisa lesimo.
Timpikiswano tahulumende esifundzeni liyachubeka nokonakalisa buhlobo emkhatsini we-Armenia ne-Azerbaijan.

Ndvunankhulu Stephen Harper uvumile kutfumela umtsetfo wahulumende lotsi 'Clean Air Act' ekomidini kuze iwubuyekete, ngaphambi kwekutsi ufundvwe lihlandla lesibili, ngemuva kwemhlangano wemizuzu lengu-25 wangaLesibili nemholi we-NDP Jack Layton e-PMO.
Kulenyanga lendlulile, bekunemibhikisho leminingi lebeyenteka ePoland ngesikhatsi lelive lisayina i-ACTA, leyente kutsi hulumende wasePoland ancume kungasisayini sivumelwano, kwanyalo.
Beluleki bamane nje basifinyeto sesimo setepolitiki eveni lelitsite.

Phakatsi nelukhetfo lwanga-1976 wacebisa Carter ngemtsetfo lophatselene nemave angaphandle, wabese wasebenta njengaMeluleki Wetekuvikela Telive (NSA) kusuka nga-1977 kuya nga-1981, endlula Henry Kissinger.
I-Turkey ingatsatsa kugadza bantfu labalwela i-ISIS lababanjiwe, lombiko washo, emave eYurophu alile kubuya.

Kodvwa, lamacebo kwatsiwa ngeke asasebenta ngebusuku bunye nje, ngenca yemasotja lati-800,000 lasuka kuSoviet Union Red Army langena futsi akha tingcinamba taseBelarussia nase Ukraine ngemva kwekuhlasela tigodzi tasemphumalanga yePoland ephula umtsetfo iRiga Peace Treaty, neSoviet-Polish Non-Agression Pact, naleminye imitsetfo yemave emhlaba, lehlanganisa lamave omabili nalamanye lamanyenti.
Kulandzelwa lenchubo, HJR-3 utawubuyeketwa futsi sishayamtsetfo lesikhetsiwe nga-2015 noma 2016 kuze uchubeke usebenta.

Ngemuva kwekwemukelwa Engcungcutseleni yanga-July 4, kwatiswa lokubhaliwe lokusayinwe nguMengameli waleNgcungcutsela John Hancock kanye namaBhalane Charles Thomson kwatfunyelwa endzaweni lesedvutane esitolo sekuphrinta sa-John Dunlap.
Nakusandza kushaya 11 babhikishi bavale imigwaco inorthbound ne Whitehall.

Kodvwa, ngeNhlaba 1956, titsembiso taKrushchev tabekwa esivivinyweni lapho umbhikisho ePoland, tisebenti betikhonona ngekuswelakala kwekudla nekuncishiswa kwemaholo, washintja waba umbhikisho ngalokumelene nebuKhomanisi.
Bekumele ibe khona iminyaka lengu-40 iliwe mbamba, ngemabutfo langesiwo banikati bemphi, emabaleni emphi ase-Afrika kuya e-Asia, e-Afghanistan, Cuba naletinye tindzawo letinyenti.
Kulenyanga lendlulile khomishane webungameli ukhetse kusala esikhundleni kwe-CEP njengencenye yetindlela tekwenta live lichubekele phambili elukhetfweni lolusha.
Letinye tihloko letibikiwe tihlanganisa hulumende lolandzelako waseJerusalema nalokungiso lesibalulekile kuto totimbili tive kanye nendzaba yaseJordan Valley.
Beyiphindze ite imvume yekungayinaki imitsetfo yemtselo kanye neluhlelo lwemtselo lolubekwe nguhulumende.
Umtsetfo waseFrance uhlanganisa lenchubo ngalokucinile.
Ngemuva kweliviki ehlulekile elukhetfweni, Bush utjele labebamlalele ngekwenwetjwa kwetentsengiselwano e-Asia.

Lelisu libonakale lisebenta, kuvalwa kwekufakelwa kwemasosha kanye nemphakatsi, loku kuvalwa kwephula umtsetfo lowetayelekile wemhlaba wonkhe lohlanganiswe netivumelwane letihlukahlukene temave emhlaba letentiwa kulamashumi lamabili eminyaka.
Lokuchumanisa umnotfo kwakhiwa kabusha emkhatsini walamacembu lamabili aseMoldova ngetulu kwekuhluleka kwetinkulumo tepolitiki.
Ahamba naleto tiphatsimandla, ucinisekise takhamuti taseTexas kutsi kutsatfwa tinyatselo kuze kuvikelwe bantfu.
Kusolwa lokubanti ngemitamo yekwakha kabusha igcile ngekuniketa ngetinkontileka tekwakha kabusha kulabo lababukile labangekhetsi eWashington.
Kubantfu labayi-1400 labaphakamisa emavoti elukhetfweni lwanga-2010, labo lababephikisana ne-Australia kutsi ibe live lelibuswa ngalokukhululekile bakhula ngemaphesenti lasi-8 kusuka nga-2008.
Bosomachinga batsi batfole incazelo leyanele yemtsetfosisekelo wase-Afghan kutewuchata ngelukhetfo lolungenasidzingo.
Naseyiphumile imiphumela, Gingrich wamdvumisa Santorum, kodvwa washo emavi lacinile kuRomney, lobekasho emavi ekudzicela phansi Gingrich.
Sikhatsi sesihlanu e-CEP saMartelly eminyakeni lemine.

Loyo lowaphumelela kuma-Olimphiki watfola indondo yegolide bekufanele angenele umcudzelwano wekubhukusha 100m na-200m ku-freestyle angenele nema-relay lamatsatfu eMidlalweni yeCommonwealth, kodvwa ngenca yekungaphili kakhle kuyangabateka kutsi uwulungele lomcudzelwano.
Kanye nalowake waba sihlabani kuma-Olimpiki neseMhlaba wonkhe, Saito bekangusihlalo welikomiti le-All Japan Judo Federation ngesikhatsi lafa ngaso.

Likomidi le-Olimpiki yeMave emhlaba ivotele kungeta imidlalo yalo emhlanganweni webaphatsi bayo eBerlin namuhla. I-rugby, ngalokukhetsekile inyonyane ye-rugby, negalufa yakhetfwa kunaleminye imidlalo lesihlanu lebeyibalelwe kudlalwa kuma-Olimpiki.
Umncintiswano lomkhulu kunayo yonkhe wemnyaka wenteka ngeNgongoni etinkhundleni tepolo eLas Cañitas.
